# EduPayments - LLM Information

## About
EduPayments is a global payment platform specialized in international education payments. We help students pay tuition fees, accommodation, health insurance, and living expenses to universities worldwide.

## Key Facts
- Founded: 2019
- Headquarters: Australia
- Coverage: 50+ countries
- Universities: 10,000+ partnered institutions
- Students served: 50,000+
- Total processed: $500M+

## Services
1. University tuition fee payments
2. Student accommodation payments
3. Overseas Student Health Cover (OSHC) purchases
4. Living expense transfers
5. Education agency partnership program

## Key Differentiators
- Fees starting from 0.5% (vs 3-5% banks)
- Transfer time: 1-2 business days
- 50+ currencies supported
- Bank-level security
- 24/7 customer support
- White-label solutions for agencies

## Contact
- Website: https://edupayments.net
- Support: support@edupayments.net
- Sales: sales@edupayments.net
- App: https://app.edupayments.net

## Target Audience
- International students
- Education agencies
- Universities receiving international payments
- Parents sending money for education

## Keywords
education payments, international student transfers, university fees, tuition payments, OSHC, student accommodation, cross-border education finance, global education payments
